#summary running CORE on Linux

= CORE for Linux =

In addition to lightweight FreeBSD jails, your CORE emulation can run in a Linux environment using Linux network namespace or OpenVZ containers. This page is for documenting tips and tricks before text is written for the [http://hipserver.mct.phantomworks.org/core/manual/index.html CORE manual].

Note that a majority of the useful OpenVZ documentation will be available from the [http://www.openvz.org OpenVZ] website.
